Class IssueManager

java.lang.Object
model.IssueManager
public class IssueManager extends Object
Class holding all issues
Version:
0.1
Author:
Artur Twardzik

  • Method Details

    • addIssue

      public void addIssue(Issue issue)
      Adds a new issue to the manager.
      Parameters:
      issue - the issue to be added

    • findIssue

      public Optional<Issue> findIssue(UUID issueID)
      Finds an issue by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      issueID - the UUID of the issue to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the issue if found, otherwise empty

    • findIssue

      public Optional<Issue> findIssue(String title)
      Finds an issue by its title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the issue to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the issue if found, otherwise empty

    • findIssueByIdFragment

      public Optional<Issue> findIssueByIdFragment(String issueID)
      Finds an issue by a fragment of its ID string.
      Parameters:
      issueID - the beginning part of the issue ID to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the issue if a match is found, otherwise empty

    • assignIssue

      public void assignIssue(Issue issue, User user) throws IssueNotFoundException
      Assigns a user to a specific issue.
      Parameters:
      issue - the issue to assign
      user - the user to assign to the issue
      Throws:
      IssueNotFoundException - if the issue does not exist in the manager

    • setIssueStatus

      public void setIssueStatus(Issue issue, BugStatus status) throws IssueNotFoundException
      Updates the status of an issue.
      Parameters:
      issue - the issue to update
      status - the new status to set
      Throws:
      IssueNotFoundException - if the issue does not exist in the manager

    • commentIssue

      public void commentIssue(Issue issue, Comment comment) throws IssueNotFoundException
      Adds a comment to a specific issue.
      Parameters:
      issue - the issue to comment on
      comment - the comment to add
      Throws:
      IssueNotFoundException - if the issue does not exist in the manager

    • filterByTag

      public List<Issue> filterByTag(String tag)
      Filters issues by a given tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of issues that contain the specified tag

    • getAllIssues

      public List<Issue> getAllIssues()
      Retrieves all issues managed by this instance.
      Returns:
      a list of all issues
